Select Target File Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System (Windows)

This dialog box appears from the Shortcuts page of the Installer Properties dialog box when you click the Add Shortcut button, and from the Advanced page when you click the Add Executable button next to the Executable text box.

Use this dialog box to select a file included in the installer for which you want a shortcut or to select an application to run after the installation is complete.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • Installer Files—Displays the supported files included in the installer build. Click a filename to select it. The listbox includes only files that the specific dialog box component supports. If you need to select an executable file for the Executable option on the Advanced page, the listbox displays only .EXE and .BAT files. If you need to select a file for a shortcut, the listbox displays all files in the installer build.
